Discussion .At the core of this study was creation of gold - standards of transcriptional regulation in humans that can be compared with target genes reported in transcriptional regulatory pathways .We focused on seven well known transcription factors and obtained gold - standards by integrating genome - wide transcription factor - DNA binding data ( from ChIP - chip , ChIP - seq , or ChIP - PET platforms ) with functional gene expression microarray and RNA - seq data .
